message.body: By the way I'm really sorry for my behavior at the party last week - I'm usually not like that, and I've been really embarrased about how it all went down - thanks for taking care of me that night - hopefully i can redeem myself somehow
Oh Andy that's so nice of you to apologize don't worry
Well ive been really embarrised about what i did and ive been stressing about it and wanted you to know im usually not like that at all - i owe you
U don't owe me. Don't stress!!! One party. Still had a great time. You just got drunk...
The only person who needs to be apologized and thanks is Fabiola She was the one who took care of you for hours. I was dancing I didn't even know it was going on. I didn't even know you puked
Yeah i talked to her too - i just feel like an ass for everything and wanted to make sure you knew i was sorry
Oh well stop feeling like an ass. This was weeks ago
I want you to know I really appreciate this apology and I want to move on from this. This morning I left the burner on. Stupider than getting drunk
Cool - glad your stove didnt burn the place down - i think you're awesome and wanted to make sure we were cool
